Analyte(s): DNA methylation patterns of 15 loci associated with transitional cell carcinoma of the bladder
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bladder EpiCheck Kit, a real-time PCR-based qualitative assay to detect DNA methylation markers for bladder cancer recurrence monitoring using voided urine
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative detection of DNA methylation patterns of 15 loci in human DNA associated with transitional cell carcinoma of the bladder, performed on voided urine and used non-invasively in conjunction with cystoscopy to monitor tumor recurrence in patients with non-muscle invasive bladder cancer
